column4: Hello. My sound doesnt work in my webbrowsers. How to fix that. In other applications it does work. But not in the webbrowsers.
Then i am talking about: Firefox, Opera.
Then i talk about: FLASH videos.
check out Chromium, and Enable HTML-5 .. Makes Web-Vid sing and no choppy U-Tube. No need fer flash.
How to enable HTML-5. And Sometimes the vids does work. SOMETIMES.
You go to the U-Tube site, and there's a button, job done.
Well, that's half the problem solved at least :-)
From bug reports: sudo apt-get --reinstall install flashplugin-installer
